phaTra:
**During hunts, the Phantom will flicker slower than other ghosts. (at least 1 second between blinks)** 
 
If you get a ghost photo, but there is no sign of a ghost on the photo when you check it in the journal, you might deal with a Phantom.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity.
phaAbi: The Phantom can choose to roam to a random player on the map, and start activity there (hunts, events, interactions)
